doc:
Initiate a replication sync w/ partner. For each class of interest:
1) Grab manifest from partner
2) Grab local manifest. For each record:
2.1) compare version id's
2.2) if partner needs my version, send it to partner's "replication' 
@param partner - name of partner (corresponding to ReplicationPartner record)
@param boClass - class of objects whose updates are sent to partner
